Subject: Allowing reader access to
Description: Within the AIC, I want to allow the Reader Role access to see Azure RBAC, Office 365 and SQL Server within the Resource Audit page.  However, it only gives me the option to enable access to File System, SharePoint and Active Directory.  Is there a way to give the Reader role additional access to view the additional permissions?
What_We_Know__c:
Customer is asking for a way to create access beyond the basic check boxes provided in AIC.
I provided the customer the steps to use "Allow access to the following servers" and am awaiting customer to apply the settings.
Solution_Comment__c:
Issue:
Allow reader access in AIC to cloud resources instead of pre-populated options.


Resolution:
You can add permission to cloud resources by specifying the tenant name instead of the server and build you own permissions this way.
